Input files.Magdata_file_path: D:\ROSOR\My_QGIS_Repo\QAQC\Mag clipper & QaQc\TEST DATA FOR MAG CLIPPER\SRVY0-ACQU109.magdata
Input files.Magdata_file_path_COMMENT: A ".magdata" file is downloaded from the MagArrow sensor. QaQc is done here.
Input files.Flight_lines_file_path: D:\ROSOR\My_QGIS_Repo\QAQC\Mag clipper & QaQc\TEST DATA FOR MAG CLIPPER\Lines_shape_file\split_extended_mag_all_lines_named.dbf|layername=split_extended_mag_all_lines_named
Input files.Flight_lines_file_path_COMMENT: Select the file that has the flight line

Auto_renaming.Provide_path_to_2d_flights: D:\ROSOR\My_QGIS_Repo\QAQC\Mag clipper & QaQc\TEST DATA FOR MAG CLIPPER\2d_mag_flts_and_ties_clipped_v3
Auto_renaming.Provide_path_to_2d_flights_COMMENT: This will rename the clean csvs to match the names of the provided kml flights

Output folders.output_csv_into_input_magdata_folder_COM: If checked,the following field will be ignored
Output folders.output_csv_folder: D:\ROSOR\QAQC\Mag clipper & QaQc\TEST DATA FOR MAG CLIPPER\output\csv
Output folders.output_pdf_into_input_magdata_folder_COM: If checked,the following field will be ignored
Output folders.output_pdf_folder: D:\ROSOR\QAQC\Mag clipper & QaQc\TEST DATA FOR MAG CLIPPER\output\pdf

Parameters.EPSG_code_of_area_COMMENT: This app needs to know what UTM_zone to convert the data to
Parameters.Y_axis_display_range_override_COMMENT: This will change scale in the magnetic intensity plots. set to 0 for it to be automatically scaled

Line Detection.line_detection_threshold_COMMENT: The area at the end of each flightline that helps determine which flightline the data belongs to
Line Detection.filter_out_lines_based_on_direction_thre: Usually 80%. Line is kept if its flying in the same direction 80% of the time. Otherwise rejected.

Parameters.acceptable_deviation_from_flightline_COM: Distance in meters that the mag can fly off-course and not be marked
Parameters.acceptable_minimum_velocity_COMMENT: The slowest acceptable drone velocity in meters per second. This helps detect when the drone stops mid-flightline.

Noise Detection.range_noise_threshold_COMMENT: do not change these values without Peter's or Geophysicist's approval. original value 40
Noise Detection.range_noise_number_of_points_COMMENT: do not change these values without  Peter's or Geophysicist's approval. original value 20

First Time Setup.Survey_Manager_exe_path_COMMENT: Survey Manager app opens ".magdata" files and converts them to ".csv" for this app to use it
